QueryViewSpec.Name: ChildExtension Batch Table
QueryViewSpec.Description: Provides support for querying on ChildExtension Batch Table information.
QueryViewSpec.Author: memphis-PC\Administrator

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.ID, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BATCHID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SEQUENCE], (select USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE where USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID]) as BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE], (select USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE where USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID]) as CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE where USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID]) as CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE where USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASCODEID]) as FATHERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE where USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASCODEID]) as MOTHERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE where USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID]) as CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE where USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID]) as CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER], (select USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE where USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERREASONCODEID]) as CAREGIVERREASONCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFSISTERS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFBROTHERS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLWOOD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLMUD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBAMBOO], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBLOCK], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTIN], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGGRASSLEAVES], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGWOOD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTILE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEINDOOR], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCECOMMUNITYTAP], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEBOREHOLEWELL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCERIVER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEWOODFIRE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEELECTRICSTOVE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEGASSTOVE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEELECTRICITY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOILLAMP], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEGENERATOR], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCENONE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[AREADESCRIPTION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MYFAVORITETHINGTODO], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIAMATSCHOOLILIKELEARNING], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SOMEDAYI], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[TWOMOSTFAVORITETHINGS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[OTHERTHINGSTHECHILDENJOYS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPERSONALITY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDHEALTH], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SPIRITUALDEVELOPMENT], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[REASONNOTATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CLASSLEVEL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FAVORITESUBJECT], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[VOCATIONALSKILLS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CCHENTEREDBY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CCHTEMPID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CURRENTPHOTODATE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PHOTOSTORED], (select USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE where USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID]) as CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID_TRANSLATION, (select USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE where USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID]) as CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FUNDED], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[TEMPCHILDID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FIRSTNAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MIDDLENAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LASTNAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[GENDERCODE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ISHIVPOSITIVE], (select SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE.DESCRIPTION from dbo.SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE where SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE.ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODEID]) as SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODEID_TRANSLATION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ISORPHANED], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PICTURE], ADDEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [ADDEDBY_APPLICATION], ADDEDBY.USERNAME as [ADDEDBY_USERNAME], CHANGEDBY.APPLICATIONNAME as [CHANGEDBY_APPLICATION], CHANGEDBY.USERNAME as [CHANGEDBY_USERNAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.DATEADDED, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.DATECHANGED, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.TSLONG from dbo.USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [ADDEDBY] on [ADDEDBY].ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.ADDEDBYID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT as [CHANGEDBY] on [CHANGEDBY].ID = USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.CHANGEDBYID
